meanings.definition: A person who studies the nervous system, especially the brain.
meanings.sent1: Neuroscientists use special tools to learn about the brain.
meanings.sent2: Many neuroscientists work in laboratories to understand the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: Why did the neuroscientists bring a brain to the party? To show off their research!
meanings.sent4: The brain is like a puzzle for neuroscientists to solve.
meanings.sent5: In movies, neuroscientists are often portrayed as brilliant minds unraveling mysteries of the brain.

meanings.definition: Those who conduct research on the functions and disorders of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neuroscientists work hard to find cures for nervous system diseases.
meanings.sent2: The neuroscientists presented their findings at the conference.
meanings.sent3: Why did the neuroscientists bring a microscope to the beach? To study the 'neural' network of seashells!
meanings.sent4: The work of neuroscientists sheds light on the complexities of the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of neuroscientists is crucial in advancing our understanding of the brain and nerves.
